```{r}
library(timevis)

data <- data.frame(id = 1:5,
                   start = c("1890-01-01",
                             "1920-01-01",
                             "1922-01-01",
                             "1950-01-01",
                             "1970-01-01"
                             ),
                   end = c(NA,NA,NA,NA,NA),
                   content = c("<p>Robert Hooke<p>
<p, style = 'font-size : 5pt;'>Proposed a mechanical theory of memory<p>",
                               "Semon",
                               "Bartlett",
                               "Miller",
                               "Jacoby"
                               )
                   )

timevis(data)



```


```{r}
#timeline from bib file

library(bib2df)

my_bib <- bib2df('cognition.bib')

timeline_df <- data.frame(id = my_bib$BIBTEXKEY,
                      start = my_bib$DATE,
                      content = paste(my_bib$AUTHOR),
                      title = my_bib$TITLE)

timevis(timeline_df)

```
